alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:17PM EDT until August 29 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... Kent County in southwestern Michigan... Northwestern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 316 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hudsonville, or 12 miles northeast of Holland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Observed wind gusts. At 3:08 pm, the West Michigan Regional Airport in Holland had a gust to 66 mph. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Hastings... Wyoming... Kentwood... Walker... Grandville... East Grand Rapids... Rockford... Sparta... Wayland... Lowell... Middleville... Caledonia... Freeport... Gerald R. Ford Inter... Ada... Dorr... Grattan... Cedar Springs... Irving... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
